title: "Cavalier" script on singlet
content:
I know it's been modified but anyone know anthing similar? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524131010im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69734.gif)   
   
Apologies for the amout of posts in this part of the forum but got my degree show in a couple of weeks so your help is greatly appreciated   
   
Cheers
author: stephen_k

comments.content:
American Pop has a similar feel.
